downloadTitle: Microsoft Server Performance Advisor 2003 Management Pack
downloadDescription: This SPA management pack for Operations Manager 2007 supports monitoring for Server Performance Advisor 2003. Requires OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update 6.0.5000.16

downloadFile.name: Server Performance Advisor 2003 SC OM 2007 MP.msi

detailsSection:
The SPA 2003 Management Pack collects performance data and generates comprehensive diagnostic reports that give you the information you need to analyze problems and develop corrective actions.

Management Pack Release History
2/14/2008 - Initial Release v.6.0.5000.0
detailsSection_file_name: Server Performance Advisor 2003 SC OM 2007 MP.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
System Center Operations Manager 2007
Microsoft Server Performance Advisor 2003
